com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.alarm

Class Alarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.util.ExtensibleObject
      • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.alarm.Alarm

  • public class Alarm
extends ExtensibleObject
    Alarm represents an alarm in the CoT. Alarms have status to indicate if alarm is active, acknowledged or cleared. Alarms have a severity.

    Created by Patrick Steinert on 22.09.16.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SEVERITY_CRITICAL
      Critical (highest severity).
      static String SEVERITY_MAJOR
      Major (2nd highest severity).
      static String SEVERITY_MINOR
      Minor(2nd lowest severity).
      static String SEVERITY_WARNING
      Warning (lowest severity).
      static String STATE_ACKNOWLEDGED
      State if alarm is acknowledged (does not escalate).
      static String STATE_ACTIVE
      State if alarm is active.
      static String STATE_CLEARED
      State if alarm is cleared.

      • Alarm

        Internal constructor to create an alarm object.

      • Alarm

        Constructor to create an alarm.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Get the unique identifier of the alarm. If the Alarm was retrieved from the platform, it has an ID. If just created, there is no ID.
        Returns:
        String the unique identifier of the alarm or null if not available.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Get the type of the alarm. The type categorizes the alarm.
        Returns:
        a String with the type or null if not available.

      • getText

        public String getText()
        Get the alarm text. Alarm text is the human readable description of the cause of the alarm.
        Returns:
        a String with the text.

      • getCreationTime

        public Date getCreationTime()
        Get the creation time of the alarm in the CoT.
        Returns:
        Date object representing the timestamp when alarm was created in CoT.

      • getTime

        public Date getTime()
        Get the time when alarm happened.
        Returns:
        Date object representing the timestamp when alarm happened.

      • getSource

        public ManagedObject getSource()
        Get the ManagedObject where the alarm originated from.
        Returns:
        the originating ManagedObject

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)
        Setting the alarm text. Can be any type of string, CoT just displays plain text.
        Parameters:
        text - a String with the text to display.

      • setType

        public void setType(String type)
        Setting the alarm type.
        Parameters:
        type - a String with the alarm type. Use cot_abc_xyz style.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(Date time)
        Set the time when alarm happened.
        Parameters:
        time - Date object with the time when alarm happened.

      • setSource

        public void setSource(ManagedObject source)
        Set the ManagedObject where alarm happened. Mandatory when creating an alarm. Don't reset if already created.
        Parameters:
        source - the source ManagedObject of the alarm.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(String status)
        Setting the current status of the alarm. It is possible to update the status.
        Parameters:
        status - Use Alarm members.

      • setSeverity

        public void setSeverity(String severity)
        Setting the current severity of the alarm. It is possible to update the severity.
        Parameters:
        severity - Use Alarm members.

      • getStatus

        public String getStatus()
        Getting the status of the Alarm.
        Returns:
        a String with the status. Use class members STATE_* to compare.

      • getSeverity

        public String getSeverity()
        Getting the severity of the Alarm.
        Returns:
        a String with the severity. Use class members SEVERITY_* to compare.
